articles.author: Julia Kollewe
articles.title: China regulatory crackdown fuels European share sell-off, Reckitt falls 9% – live - The Guardian
articles.description: FTSE 100 index falls below 7,000 level, as Reckitt Benckiser is squeezed by rising commodity costs and says it will put up its prices

articles.author: Ian Mangan
articles.title: RTE boss apologises over weather and climate change coverage amid Ireland heatwave - Irish Mirror
articles.description: The state broadcaster had been subject to much criticism for its coverage of the flooding events across Europe as well as the heatwave in Ireland
articles.content:
An RTE boss has apologised for the broadcaster's recent coverage of flooding across Europe.
RTE managing director of news and current affairs Jon William's took to Twitter on Monday evening to apolo… [+2102 chars]
